use_action.holster_prompt: Stick what into your drop leg pouch?

description: A crude wooden table.

//: The code from dogmeat's mod ends here.

use_action.msg: You re-grab your trench knife, to use it as a knuckleduster.
You re-grab your trench knife, to use it as a knife.

description: A plastic broom and a dustpan.  Makes a terrible weapon unless you're chasing cats.
A portable electric fan that steadily emits cool air.  Lowers temperature about 10 degrees C.

use_action.done_message: You string up some cans on a tripwire.

description: A large and heavy revolver evidently welded from scrap.  It's not pretty, but the .45 and .44 it's chambered with packs a serious punch.  Just watch out for the kick.  This one is especially made so that the suppressor is avilable to use.
Submachinegun, 9mm.  It's got poor accuracy, almost like a shotgun from hell.  That's why they call it a "Bastard gun."  Accepts all 9mm magazines.
A double-column, single-feed 9x19mm magazine used by the bastard submachine gun, based off the magazines from the infamous STEN gun.
An improvised magazine that is mostly compatible with the bastard submachine gun, with a simplified feed system.
An improvised magazine that is mostly compatible with the bastard submachine gun, with a complex feed system.  Unreliable.
A leather bandolier for keeping rifle cartridges close to hand.
A small fabric bandolier for rifle cartridges designed to be worn around the wrist.
A pouch for holding up to eight full-sized grenades of various types.
A wooden slingshot, easy to use and accurate.  It uses pebbles as ammunition.
A modern slingshot with a wrist brace, it is easy to use, accurate, and quite powerful.
An ammo belt consisting of metal linkages which disintegrate upon firing.  This one holds 40mm grenades.
A shortened barrel results in markedly reduced accuracy, and a minor increase in noise, but also greatly improves the damage and ease with which the weapon can be carried and wielded.
A broken shard of glass covered in sharp edges.  With a piece of rag you could use it to make it a primitive weapon.

This is an advanced version of the unified power supply, or UPS.  Designed for military use to power advanced weapons, it has a hand crank, but only accepts rechargeable batteries.  It can power many household electronics as well.

name: Louisville Slaughterer
description: This is sturdy wood bat, wrapped in gasoline-soaked rags and flame-resistant Nomex fabric.  Light it, and the ball game will REALLY heat up.  You'll need a lighter or matches to light it.

name: Louisville Slaughterer
description: This is a sturdy wood bat, wrapped in gasoline-soaked rags and flame-resistant Nomex fabric.  It is burning brightly, and makes it much easier to see the baselines at night games (It also makes the umpire FAR more likely to call a ball instead of a strike).
This huge steel knife has been modified with a fuel tank, insulated handguard, and ignition system.  When filled with gasoline, a system of torches heats the blade, burning your target.
This huge steel knife has been modified with a fuel tank, insulated handguard, and ignition system.  The blade is glowing with heat, making it a great plant scorcher and nightlight.

use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your No. 9 hisses in the water and goes out.

description: This is a large blade with a fuel pipe on the side, and a small tank and igniter built into the insulated hilt.  When filled with gasoline, the blade can be made scorching hot to singe enemies and light your way.  Use to ignite.

use_action.failure_message: Aw, dangit.  It fails to start!

description: This is a large blade with a fuel pipe on the side, and a small tank and igniter built into the insulated hilt.  The blade is glowing brightly.  Use to shut off the gas.

use_action.auto_extinguish_message: Bummer, man!  Your shishkebab's flame flickers and dies out.
use_action.voluntary_extinguish_message: Peace out.  Your shishkebab's flame dies.
use_action.charges_extinguish_message: Uncool, outta gas!  Your shishkebab's flame goes out.
use_action.water_extinguish_message: Your shishkebab hisses in the water and goes out.

description: A collapsible buttstock designed for various underbarrel weapons.  When combined with this stock, the gun can be used as a standalone weapon.
Reveals an area around you on the overmap
message: You have a vision of the surrounding area

description: Reveals an area around you on the overmap
message: You have a vision of the surrounding area

description: Durable handheld GPS unit built for outdoor navigation.  Activate to acquire satellite lock and search the database.

use_action.msg: You turn the gps pinpointer on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The gps pinpointer's batteries are dead.

use_action.msg: You turn the gps pinpointer off.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The gps pinpointer's batteries are dead.

description: Durable handheld GPS unit built for outdoor navigation.  Activate to acquire satellite lock and search the database.  This one has encrpytion keys for military-grade satellites, allowing a much greater search range.

use_action.msg: You turn the military gps pinpointer on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The gps pinpointer's batteries are dead.

use_action.msg: You turn the military gps pinpointer off.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The military gps pinpointer's batteries are dead.

description: Somewhere between a bullet crossbow and a slingshot on steroids, this shoulder-mounted weapon uses a winch to keep several elastic bands under tension.  It fires full-size rocks with much more power and range than pebbles out of a normal slingshot.  High strength will make it faster to reload.

A hand built rocket, consisting of a spike welded onto a pipe that was filled with improvised rocket fuel.  Horribly inaccurate, as can be expected of this grade of weapon, but packs a fierce punch if it hits.
A hand built rocket, consisting of a simple explosive warhead attached onto a pipe, filled with improvised rocket fuel.  Not very powerful, but can be made from scratch.
